creator: rfrovarp@apache.org
text:
Sometimes going to the Sessions section under the admin section works. But it
seems that more often than not, it doesn't work. It does a dump complaining
about Cocoon and Javascript. I have seen the error on zones, sometimes.

[object Error]
(file:/usr/local/lenya-1.4.x/build/lenya/webapp/lenya/modules/usecase/usecases.js#327)

org.apache.cocoon.ProcessingException: Error calling flowscript function
executeUsecase at [JavaScriptException] -
file:/usr/local/lenya-1.4.x/build/lenya/webapp/lenya/modules/usecase/usecases.js:327
at
file:/usr/local/lenya-1.4.x/build/lenya/webapp/lenya/modules/usecase/usecases.js:329
at <map:call> -
file:/usr/local/lenya-1.4.x/build/lenya/webapp/lenya/modules/usecase/usecase.xmap:95:45
at <map:mount> -
file:/usr/local/lenya-1.4.x/build/lenya/webapp/lenya/usecase.xmap:57:131 at
<map:mount> -
file:/usr/local/lenya-1.4.x/build/lenya/webapp/global-sitemap.xmap:305:105 at
<map:mount> - file:/usr/local/lenya-1.4.x/build/lenya/webapp/sitemap.xmap:651:106

creator: nettings@apache.org
text:
can't reproduce this with current trunk. i think it may have been fixed by
andreas a while ago...
Having the issue on my test system and just had it happen on zones as well.
creator: rfrovarp@apache.org
